overview: Henry Myers (Drew Walters) is living a hard life, surviving on the frontier any way he can â€“ even if it means robbing a bank. After his latest heist backfires and his partners (Bea Smith and Rio Alexander) betray him and leave him for dead, Henry's life takes a surprising turn when he finds kindness and compassion from a widow (Erin Bethea) and her children (Jaden Roberts and Ezra Proch).
title: The Redemption of Henry Myers
